body:
Tits look affected enough by gravity,Hair has a bit too many strains. It's all good and all but my main issue is that the panels all look so damn alike!

If you scroll fast in overview mode you will see that your eyes will be unable to tell the difference between some panels.

This is due to the artist having too many of the same positions just rotated in the next panel. What i mean by this is that in one panel the head of a girl will be at 12 o' clock and in the next panel it will be at 1 o' clock.
This gives a good sense of movement that the reader's eyes can easily keep track of but makes all the panels look way too similar.

+points for giving more attention to Wiz,which i find is somewhat rare in Kazuma art.

All in all if you can just learn to seperate the looks of one image strip from the other,your art will have great success!
Yay! My two favorite girls in a doujin! (Kazuma you lucky bastard)
Finally some Eris doujin, now we play the waiting game.
The 2 best gril of the show
Wait, what? Is your comment hinting at something...? Or am I just overthinking things?
@OnlineLoner That's Chr- I mean Eris, the goddess that took over Aqua's job.
its time boys we hold so many year for wiz now let it out boys let it out
